vee.android.lib

Class SimpleSharedPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • vee.android.lib.SimpleSharedPreferences

  • public class SimpleSharedPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Modified version of SharedPreferences.
    Initiate "SimpleSharedPreferences" by passing Context. 
     SimpleSharedPreferences mPreferences = new SimpleSharedPreferences(getApplicationContext());
    Start Modifying / Accessing data in SimpleSharedPreferences. 
     mPreferences.putString(key, value);
 mPreferences.getString(key, defaultValue);
    DO NOT to use SharedPreferences#edit() or Editor#commit()

    Note:
    • Usage of deprecated methods throws InstantiationError.
    • apply() is available only after API-9
    • Throws "ClassCastException" if wrong key is passed
    See Also:
    Context#getSharedPreferences, SharedPreferences

      • getAppOpenedCount

        public int getAppOpenedCount()
        Returns:
        The number of times the was opened. This will not autoupdate, everytime the app is opened.
        You should call incrementAppOpenedCount() on Activity#onStart() to update this.
